column5: Fishnsled and I headed out this morning to fish.  Once again we didn't know where we were actually going until we hit the road!  After much debate over a coffee and breakfast while on the road, we decided on hitting Lake Scugog.  Now this isn't my favourite lake, but with the wind forecast, this seemed like the right lake for us.  Thankfully the winds were 15k + gusts, or we'd have been roasted off the lake!  It was a bit tough fishing in the windy conditions, but we did manage to pull a few fish from the bog.  First, Fishnsled was up...landing this small guy...   The bite was very slow...carp were rolling around everywhere in the shallows and we had a hard time finding feeding bass.  I was getting a little tired so I sat down, put my feet up and ended up catching this little guy...   Around 11am...I'm throwing a senko into the lily pads when all of the sudden I feel what may be a weed...may be a fish.  I set the hook anyways and I was rewarded with some weight and a huge splash out in the weeds!  After running under the boat and horsing it back out, I was rewarded with what I think is my new PB.  It weighed in just shy of 5 pounds.   The bite once again slowed down and I managed just one more fish. The winds and heat finally got the best of us and we were off the water at about 2pm.  All in all yet another great day on the water.  Getting a nice fish is always a bonus!!
A slow day of fishing with 1 nice Largie is better than a good day at work lol, looks like a great day. Tight Lines SBK
Nice job guys! That Largemouth looks great congrads!  MTBF
Pretty well sums that little Hot Bassin' report up.  Nice one Cliff.  You're making the best of the weather and summer off work.
A great day as always when fishing with you Cliff and a beauty bucket to boot.  Let's do it again soon!!
nice report  fishing was pretty damn consistent on simcoe yesterday between 8am-11am. A lot of fish and a few worth weighing. The winds were a little much after 11.
Nice bass. That's a nice PB for sure. Way to go guys.  Pidge.
Well done there Clifford and Wil. We need to set up a match soon.  Lunch on the 2nd team.
Nice largie!!! That made the day!
